string-array.name: welcome
string-array.item: Welcome to Lister, this is your first list
Add an item by pressing "+ Add Item" below
Lists can feature many kinds of tags including #hash tags @people tags and date tags
Hashtags can also include hex color codes to color an item #FF00FF
New Lists can be created with the #FF5722 + button at the bottom
Lists can be deleted or archived with the check and X buttons just below
